We just arrived in Barbados and I always had travel plan coverage but when arrived I was notified I did not have coverage.  In 10 mins I had accumulated 70 dollars of roaming charges.  I was not expecting this can you help
Data Roaming is disabled but I was still charged
i want to know why I  was charged us roaming instead of pay per use for 3 texts

I bought numerous travel packages to go to Mexico. I just got some texts from Telus saying I am at 1100 dollars in roaming charges. Even though I have bought travel packages. Please look into this. Thanks

On my recent bill I have been charged for US roaming and Easy roam when i entered the US, I got a message to join the US roaming service for 20 dollars which I agreed to. I thought that this would prevent me from charges. I don't understand. What should I do when I go to the US?

I need to confirm Roaming Charges. When this plan was started I was on US Canada  phone and Text and US Roaming  Now Sue is travelling and we are getting text message for excessive roaming charges. What is going on!?
Hi, i have questions about roaming charges on my account.
I went to US on April 15th, I did not use my cell while I was there. i got charged the 11 dollar roaming fee. On my bill it charged at 4.03 pm but I was back in Canada by 1:16

I'm travelling in the USA & I called Telus before I left to make sure I wouldn't have the problem I'm having now. They assured me I didn't need to change anything about my plan because I'd be covered. I was charged 13 on this past bill and i'm super upset about it
Good morning, I wanted to contest my US roaming charges.

Why have both of the phones that are on this plan being charged with the 7.00 us fee?  only 518-759-6155 was used when we were in the states. Emails were received from telus, but the phone was not used.
if I disable roaming, is that guaranteed to stop the charges
Quick question.  When you are in the U.S. are texts from IPhone to IPhone in Canada still charged as roaming when I am on a wifi account in the U.S.?

I am enquiring about my service while I am in the United States. I received a notice that advised that I have roaming charges. I am confused. On my last trip I had a flat fee charge. My bill includes a regular fee for things like US and Canada charges
I was just speaking to someone regarding my account charges for roaming. I am not understanding and am very unhappy to be charged 240 dollars in roaming charges when we turned our data off.

We were in michigan at my daughters and I was charged roaming charges.  I always have my phone on airplane mode till i get there than i hook into their wifi.  Why am I being charged roaming charges.  While I was there my phone never left the house
so as soon as I use my phone in the US it automatically charges me a roaming fee per the 24 hour period of use, right?
going to the United States on Monday till Friday, what's the daily rate?
Just tell me the monthly rate for your travel plan, please.

I just got notification of my mobility bill. There is a charge of 196 dollars for roaming. I was in Mexico and it said that roaming charges would only happen when I texted or called out or when I used Data.
I have peace of mind us and Canada plan, but I still got charged for my tablet usage in US
If I make or answer a call from Canada while in US, just want to confirm if I will just be charge the twelve dollars a day ?

I have questions about my roaming. My husband and I recently went on a 16 day trip to france and I purposefully turned off my cellular roaming for the majority of our trip so that we both didn't get charged for roaming while travelling. I now see we got charged 11 days of roaming
I just need to know if I'm in Alberta I will be charged for receiving calls or if I call someone else who is in canada

I got a text saying I was being charged roaming cost and I was confused because I set my EASY roam before entering the states so I don't know why it wasn't active. I also had no service for the first two hours upon entering so I didn't receive any text

If I access the travel coverage for the US on say June 17 to phone a cab or check email, and then don't use it again until maybe June 20, am I charged the daily fee of 12 for the days the service is not used?  return to canada would be June 26

I got my mobility bill and I have roaming charged on my phone number of 250 888-0816 but I disabled cellular while in the US and have made no outgoing phone calls. Bill says I made 9 calls. What is going on?
